title: Arteta warns that clubs could pull out of cups amid fixture congestion: football news – live
summary: Join our writers for updates and insights as the weekend's football matches approach. Stay informed about key events and player news. Don't miss out on the latest in football!

title: Trump calls for Senate to scrap filibuster as Johnson again refuses to bring back the House during shutdown – US politics live
summary: Snap food benefits will expire this weekend as the government shutdown approaches a duration similar to the record set during 2018-2019. This could impact millions of individuals and families reliant on these benefits for food assistance. The ongoing shutdown raises concerns about food security and support for vulnerable populations.

title: Letter: Prunella Scales obituary
summary: Quentin Falk reflects on the impact of an actress cast by David Lean in his 1954 film "Hobson's Choice." The role marked a significant early achievement in her career. Her performance left a lasting impression on audiences.

title: Rob Jetten celebrates ‘historic result’ as his centrist D66 party is projected to win Dutch election – Europe live
summary: Preliminary analysis by the Netherlands news agency ANP indicates that D66 is poised to maintain a significant lead over Geert Wilders' far-right PVV in the upcoming election. Final results have not been confirmed yet. The D66's position appears to be strong and likely unassailable.

title: Worries about immigration are ‘manufactured panic’ says charity as poll shows issue not a local concern – UK politics live
summary: A YouGov poll reveals that only 26% of respondents view immigration as a local issue, while over half consider it a significant national concern. This indicates a disconnect between local and national perceptions of immigration. The findings highlight differing priorities and concerns among the population regarding immigration policy.
